effect.en: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
This attack does 10 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

description.en: These Pokémon were once near extinction due to poaching. Following protective regulations, there is now an overabundance of them.
